item.description: Why farm and field size matters: Exploring their role for food security and sustainable agriculture in South America The project is funded through the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under the Marie Sk≈Çodowska-Curie grant agreement No 796451. For news on the project, please have a look at the blog using the “FFSize” filter. Summary Agriculture is the dominant land use on Earth, covering approximately one third of its terrestrial surface, and crucial for sustaining human life by providing food, feed, and bioenergy.
